thread.title: Michael Beasley Leaves Game After Gross-Looking Knee Injury [Graphic]
thread.title_full: Michael Beasley Leaves Game After Gross-Looking Knee Injury [Graphic]

author: Patrick Redford
title: Michael Beasley Leaves Game After Gross-Looking Knee Injury [Graphic]
text:
Go to permalink Photo: Jason Miller/ Getty 
The Bucks have played the Cavaliers tough this year, and they somehow ended the first half against Cleveland up by two. They had to play a bit of the half without Michael Beasley, after his leg buckled and he had to leave the game with a knee injury. The Bucks announced that he’d suffered a left knee sprain and wouldn’t return. Advertisement 
Here’s the injury, which is not for the faint of heart or those who don’t want to see a knee bend the wrong way. 
And another angle. 
It hasn’t been a good year for the knees of Bucks players . Recommended Stories
